segments.text: And lightweight , too . It'll play for 20 hours on two AA batteries !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! The sound is great . These earphones are awesome !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And they're really safe . They'll protect your ear from sound damage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You certainly need that . You always pump the volume up way too high .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . And you can also hear outside noises while you listen to music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right ! So I can listen to music while riding my motorbike !
segments.speaker: S2
